U got that prob with any else game??
I got same kind of prob earlier, with every game almost... & reason was, that my graphics cards fan has broken.. Bought new cooling system to videocard & everything worked again.. So it might be cos ur videocard overheats, then pc reboots, to prevent any hardware damages.. Open ur pc case, turn pc on & see if ur videocards fan is rolling.. if its not, thats the prob..
PS this game works on multiplayer, enjoy :]

Okey.. 

This is the general install for all the games or 90% of em :)

Step1: Download the game by pressing (Ladda ner denna torrent) (Download this torrent)

Step2: Unrar the iso file or the map were the game are in whit (Winrar) (Winzip)

Step3: If u got an iso/img file mount it by using (Deamontools)or(Alco120%)

Step4: Now install the game and follow the instruktions or something. The cdkey will u find in a text file whit the name Cdkey or in a systemfile whitch u open like this. (Rightklick/Openwhit/Textfile)

Step5: Crack! This is what the most ppl have there problems whit. U coppy the crack were u find on the disk or in a seperat mapp. Coppy the crack into ur gamefolder. If its an .EXE file u do the same but coppy the crackfile and make it ur lunch file.

Step6: Done! play ur game! GLHF!

Always make shure that u read the Info file before u do annything. If u are new tho the crack thing read everything and make shure u dont harm ur compiuter.
